# foodwebbuilder

<!-- badges: start -->
[![Lifecycle: experimental](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-experimental-orange.svg)](https://lifecycle.r-lib.org/articles/stages.html#experimental)
[![CRAN status](https://www.r-pkg.org/badges/version/foodwebbuilder)](https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=foodwebbuilder)
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of foodwebbuilder is to reconstruct local food-web structures that account for intraspecific diet variation by integrating both taxonomic identity and body size (see Bonnaff√© et al. (2021) and Danet et al. (2021) for more details).

## Installation

You can install the released version of foodwebbuilder from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r

devtools::install_github("Fellows-of-the-Fish-Food-Webs-F3W/foodwebbuilder")
```
